entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 9.

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending near noon. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
